mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSESSMENT(SUB_SEQ_NUM, STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_NAME, PROFESSOR_ID, PROFESSOR_NAME, PROFESSOR_GRADE, STUDENT_SCORE, SEMESTER) VALUES(#{sub_seq_num}, #{student_id}, #{student_name}, #{professor_id},#{professor_name}, 0, 0, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT S.SUB_SEQ, S.SUB_CATEGORY, S.MAJOR_NUMBER, S.SUB_GRADE, S.SUB_SEMESTER, S.SUB_NAME, S.PROFESSOR_ID, S.PROFESSOR_NAME, S.SUB_INFO, S.SUB_ROOM, S.SUB_WEEK, S.SUB_S_CLASS, S.SUB_E_CLASS, S.SUB_MAX_STUDENT, S.SUB_NOW_STUDENT, S.SUB_POINT, S.SUB_REF, S.SUB_PARENT FROM ASSESSMENT A, SUBJECT S WHERE A.SUB_SEQ_NUM = S.SUB_SEQ AND A.STUDENT_ID=#{user_id} ORDER BY SUB_REF ASC, SUB_MAX_STUDENT DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ASSESSMENT WHERE SUB_SEQ_NUM=#{sub_seq_num} and STUDENT_ID=#{student_id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SUB_SEQ_NUM, S.SUB_NAME, A.STUDENT_ID, A.STUDENT_NAME, A.PROFESSOR_ID, A.PROFESSOR_NAME, A.STUDENT_SCORE, S.SUB_ROOM, S.SUB_WEEK, S.SUB_S_CLASS, S.SUB_E_CLASS FROM ASSESSMENT A, SUBJECT S WHERE A.SUB_SEQ_NUM = S.SUB_SEQ AND A.PROFESSOR_ID=#{professor_id} AND A.SUB_SEQ_NUM=#{sub_seq_num} ORDER BY STUDENT_ID ASC
